name: voice-whisper-bot
description: Voice Whisper Bot with Telegram, Backend and Frontend

scripts.dev:all: dotenv -e .env.dev -- concurrently -n "BOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "green,yellow,cyan" "cd telegram-bot && node index.js" "cd web/backend && npm run start:dev" "cd web/frontend && npm run dev"
scripts.prod:build: dotenv -e .env.prod -- bash -c 'cd web/backend && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build'
scripts.prod:all: npm run prod:build && dotenv -e .env.prod -- concurrently -n "BOT,BACKEND,FRONTEND" -c "red,magenta,blue" "cd telegram-bot && node index.js" "cd web/backend && npm run start:prod" "cd web/frontend && npm run preview"
scripts.db:dev:reset: docker stop postgres-dev && docker rm postgres-dev && docker volume rm voice-notes-dev-data && cd web/backend && docker-compose up -d postgres-dev && sleep 3 && DATABASE_URL='postgresql://postgres:postgres@localhost:5433/voice_notes_db?schema=public' npx prisma migrate deploy
